Description:
Escape Dead Island - a single-user company to a series of Dead Island, which is in the form of horror with a strong emphasis on story and talk about the events that took place between the first and second parts of the series. The game tells about the son of media mogul Cliff Kahlo, who went into quarantine (last paradise) island called Bana with the aim of shooting a documentary about the life of a zombie. Cliff - the spoiled son of a powerful media mogul, who stole a boat with his father's friends, for the filming of the documentary: Revealing the truth to the public about the outbreak of the zombie virus on the island of Bana. Their plan: to get into a top-secret quarantine island of the archipelago Narapela and shoot everything that happens there. Players as in previous installments of the series will be free to explore this large island, but this time we must act covertly as possible, to avoid encounters with the bloodthirsty zombies who can hear your every whisper and feel your scent. Escape Dead Island is different from other parts of the visual style, but it will also have to fight in melee with the zombies in the setting of a tropical island. You will have a set of new weapons.

Features:
Solve the mystery of the universe zombie Dead Island.
Immerse yourself in the adventure, is shrouded in mystery.
Find special items to get into new corners of the island.
Use a wide variety of weapons to kill zombies.
Discover the secrets of the universe Dead Island.
Find out what happened in the interval between the events of the previous games in the series and Dead Island 2.
